Articles.Content:
I read on steam that 0.23 Update is live does this mean that update is available, and if so why this is not mentioned on website and forum?

I'm bought my game trough KSP store in 2012.

What do you mean not mentioned?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/content/240-KSP-0-23-Is-Live%21

The same post is on the forums and Steam (announcing 0.23) and it was on the front page of the website until more recent news pushed it off.

That, and you've clearly missed the billion "What are you doing in 0.23?" posts on here.

If you use the KSP store, you just need to go and log into that and download the game

The same post is on the forums and Steam (announcing 0.23) and it was on the front page of the website until more recent news pushed it off.

That, and you've clearly missed the billion "What are you doing in 0.23?" posts on here.

If you use the KSP store, you just need to go and log into that and download the game

Already updated the game, thanks.

Recently I have not played in KSP, because I had a lot of other activities.

The cool thing is the archive. Although I thought that there will economic and political management element, Ketbal Politburo or Kebal Congress:D , with only one in mind how to disturb my work:D
As OP is now a courant, thread closed.
